title: Project-Based Learning for Workwear Design for Professional Female Chefs

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of clothing design and pattern making, understanding functional requirements for workwear
context.additional_context: Problem-solving-centered education reflecting the work environment requirements of professional female chefs. Conducting design prototyping and evaluation using VR simulations in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze functional clothing design requirements for female chefs by applying the FEA model (Functionality, Expressiveness, Aesthetic Elements)
Learners can evaluate the functionality and wearability of workwear prototypes using VR simulation tools
Learners can effectively present final design outcomes to stakeholders (virtual clients) in business presentation format
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
